infor.name: estimated_life_expectancy
infor.message:
Life expectancy

This calculator uses life expectancy based on 2012 population projections developed by the Office for National Statistics.

infor.name: annual grow information
infor.message: Select the percentage relating to the estimated annual growth of your fund.

infor.name: annual charge information
infor.message:
Change the percentage to match the charges you are paying to your provider.

The charges you pay can have an impact on the length of time your fund will last.
